EmailTemplate.name: 4 - High Net Worth Clients
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Here's how to attract high-net-worth clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
I just left you a voicemail detailing how I can help you engage high-net-worth clients using the marketing tools offered by Five Star Professional.
I've spoken to some of the top-producing professionals around the country, helping them attract high-value clients, stand out from the competition, and maximize referrals. I would like to connect with you sometime over the next couple of days to talk about how you can do the same.
2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession_c} Award Guide
Thoughts?
{!User.Name}
Account Manager Five Star Professional
2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120, Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone}
{!User.Email}
www.fivestarprofessional.com
